title: Event Recommendations for Social Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest social activities based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and prevent isolation.

title: Family Communication Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to easily communicate with my family through voice calls, video calls, and messaging so that I can maintain strong connections and feel less isolated.

title: Social Engagement Reminders
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to set reminders for upcoming social activities so that I do not miss opportunities to engage with my family and community.

title: Community Connection Features
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to suggest local community resources and clubs so that I can maintain my social connections and engage in activities that interest me.

title: User Feedback Mechanism
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to easily submit feedback about ALFRED's social features so that I can express my satisfaction and suggest improvements without feeling overwhelmed.
